channel.title: Food on Matt Andreko
channel.description: Recent content in Food on Matt Andreko

item.title: The demise of "Fast Food"
item.description: Let’s say you’re on your way to church Sunday morning, or just wanting a easy meal after a long day of work. One option for food may be going to a fast food restaurant. This has been the case for my entire life. Lately however I’ve noticed a trend. Fast food just isn’t fast anymore. Whenever the wife and I go see her family in Lafayette, we will stop somewhere to get breakfast as a treat.
